donor_name: Secretaria de Direitos Econômico do Ministério da Justiça
outputs.output_descr: This project aims at supporting the Secretariat for Economic Rights from the Ministry of Justice in the full realization of its mandate, through the development of technical studies and researches in the areas of economic and consumer rights.To achieve this aim, the project's activities are structured into two main results: (1) an antitrust consolidated environment in the country; and (2) a strengthened Consumer Protection National System.

project_descr: Fortalecimento da proteção e defesa da concorrência e dos direitos do consumidor no Brasil
